name: El Convento Boutique Hotel
description: Luxury boutique hotel in a restored 16th-century convent, offering a unique and elegant experience.

name: Restaurante Welten
description: International and Guatemalan cuisine in a colonial atmosphere with a garden. Ideal for lunch and dinner.

name: Caoba Farms Restaurant & Organic Store
description: Farm-to-table restaurant with fresh organic products, butterfly sanctuary, and local products store.

name: Artisan Coffee Antigua
description: Specialty coffee shop focusing on Guatemalan origin coffee, artisanal brewing methods, and pastries.

name: Nim Po't Traditional Textiles Center
description: Large artisan cooperative offering a vast selection of traditional Mayan textiles and handicrafts.

name: Finca Filadelfia Coffee Resort & Tours
address: 150m North of San Felipe de Jesus Church, Antigua Guatemala
description: Coffee plantation with tours, tastings, restaurant, hotel, and adventure activities like zip-lining.

name: ChocoMuseo Antigua
description: Chocolate museum with workshops to make your own chocolate, cocoa products store, and cafe.

name: Antigua Tours by Elizabeth Bell
description: Cultural tours and guided walks by experts on the history and architecture of Antigua Guatemala.
